attributes.action: help reduce carbon emmissions by introducing a tariff/tax on goods/services supplied by countries who are not actively seeking to reduce their carbon emmissions, such as U.S.A, China, India and others. The Tax/Tariff calculation should be based on the level of pollutants contributed by each country, and in turn stop taxing UK citizens for other countries avoidance of this issue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to recognise countries that actively seek to reduce their carbon emmissions and penalise countries who do not. Introducing a tax/tariff on these countries and widening it to be Europe wide may make these coutries take global warming seriously.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
